snippet: An appeals court on Wednesday upheld key findings in a 2013 ruling that deputies under Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County systemically committed racial profiling of Latinos.
abstract: Arizona appeals court upholds key aspects of 2013 ruling that found deputies under Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County, Ariz, had systemically committed racial profiling of Latinos; also affirms remedies that previous judge had imposed.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court on Wednesday upheld key findings in a 2013 ruling that deputies under Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County systemically committed racial profiling of Latinos.

headline.main: Arizona: Court Upholds Ruling on Police Profiling
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Court Upholds Ruling on Police Profiling
